sracos¶

This module contains the class SRacos, which is the sequential version of Racos (a classification based optimization algorithm).

Author:
Yu-ren Liu
class sracos.SRacos[source]¶

The class SRacos represents Sequential Racos algorithm. It’s inherited from RacosCommon.

__init__()[source]¶

Initialization.

binary_search(iset, x, begin, end)[source]¶

Find the first element larger than x.

Parameters:
  • iset – a solution set
  • x – a Solution object
  • begin – begin position
  • end – end position
Returns:

the index of the first element larger than x
static distance(x, y)[source]¶

Get the distance between the list x and y :param x: a list :param y: a list :return: Euclidean distance

opt(objective, parameter, strategy='WR', ub=1)[source]¶

SRacos optimization.

Parameters:
  • objective – an Objective object
  • parameter – a Parameter object
  • strategy – replace strategy
  • ub – uncertain bits, which is a parameter of SRacos
Returns:

Optimization result
replace(iset, x, iset_type, strategy='WR')[source]¶

Replace a solution(chosen by strategy) in iset with x.

Parameters:
  • iset – a solution list
  • x – a Solution object
  • iset_type – ‘pos’ or ‘neg’
  • strategy – ‘WR’: worst replace or ‘RR’: random replace or ‘LM’: replace the farthest solution
Returns:

the replaced solution
strategy_lm(iset, best_sol, x)[source]¶

Replace the farthest solution from best_sol

Parameters:
  • iset – a solution set
  • best_sol – the best solution, distance between solution in iset and best_sol will be computed
  • x – a Solution object
Returns:

the farthest solution (has the largest margin) in iset
strategy_rr(iset, x)[source]¶

Replace a random solution in iset.

Parameters:
  • iset – a solution set
  • x – a Solution object
Returns:

the replaced solution
strategy_wr(iset, x, iset_type)[source]¶

Replace the worst solution in iset.

Parameters:
  • iset – a solution set
  • x – a Solution object
  • iset_type – ‘pos’ or ‘neg’
Returns:

the worst solution
